name: fullstack-part3-phonebook
description: Fullstack web development course exercise submissions for part 3 Phonebook project

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../fullstack/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstack-individual-parts/fullstack-part3-phonebook/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Sergey Zakuraev
